item.title: VSCode Python Installation Instructions
item.description: VSCode Installation Download VSCode Choose the appropriate build from the multiselect ![build options](/images/build.png =500x520) Python Extension Install the VSCode Python Extension named Python in the VSCode Marketplace ![python extension](/images/pythonextension.png =600x300) Install Python Windows Download Python Mac & Linux Follow instruction from here
